item.title: How to make custom spray for CS
item.description: hi its very easy to use custome sprays in counter strike just follow all the steps given below download spray file with extension wad then rename it to tempdecal.wad now i have cs 1.6 goto Counter-Strike\cstrike and paste wad file now start game goto options select srap apply it and start playing and during play press T to spray. Bye.
